author: Paul Purail
comment: The best damn note taking app imho. I can easily assign an always showing shortcut on the screen to open this app, if you are on the keyboard I can  use the pause function on the keyboard for a video lecture whilst simulatenously typing on the notepad. You can also open multiple notes, use keyboard shortcuts, automatically save. The only thing I want added is universal cloud access to the notes on multiple systems like google keep. This app is closely similar to one other app I know of, but this one has better features. Thank you so much developer, I'm going to check out your apps, if there are any. This is helping me with my lecture viewing alot. Thank you.

author: Matthew Sly
comment: I love this app. It is so helpful because I'm always forgetting some thing. With this app you can have a reminder of what you need to get done right on your screen. And I use my tablet on a daily basis. Plus you can choose your own theme. The only thing I don't like, is that you can't create your own theme. Please make this an option, and I will put to 5 ❇

author: Alex Johnson
comment: Love that its free and no ads, very functional allos multitasking.  Complaint though, on my slide kb if I type the number 2 it closes immediately and doesn't save or anything just vanishes (not even to notification bar).
title: Really cool idea and useful

author: Destyni Mueller
comment: The app itself is really nice. The logo and icon could use some work. Especially the icon when you minimize it. It doesn't feel modern, or look that amazing on my phone screen. I had removed the app for a while, but no app works as well as this one. So I guess I'll live with it for now.
title: Great App, Logo Could Use Work

author: Muzaffar Ismail
comment: Very solid note app with seamless and customizable floating window. Yes it doesn't have many themes, but it works very well with no compatibility issues at all. Features I'd like to see would be a word count and spell checker function and I would love to pay for them.
title: Instant multitasking done well

comment: Just wanted to thank you again for your  Outstanding  app.  It's the best floating text out-there. I use it in conjunction with metamoji,  freenote and journal binder and these are the bread- and- butter of my editing work. I would struggle to function without  them.
title: One of the best apps. in the store

author: Ama Nota Gogo
comment: No longer need to scratch around for a notepad,  or launch a note app,  quick!  just pull down and type. You can think of a name afterwards, decide if you want to save it afterwards. Share,  copy paste.  Just what I  need. Highly recommend.
title: Man I think it is GREAT!

author: Maple Leaf
comment: Was writing a long text file, maybe between 10000 and 2000 words. It suddenly flashed off and on, and only the first 600 words remained. Lost maybe 2-3 hours of work. Tried it several times and found it does indeed crash and lose data if the file is long enough.
title: Lost my data

author: Sandi M Blair
comment: For me, the best thing since sliced bread!  So easy to copy text from one app to another or from the web to an app with few keystrokes.  Can paste all or a portion of the info copied.  Hovernote can be enlarged to cover the whole screen, or it can revert to a small icon with one tap.  You can have multiple Hovernotes floating on the screen at once, and you can drag them to wherever you want them.  When you change to a different app, the Hovernotes are still hovering and can easily be pasted.  Not sure if a name of a note can be made to appear on the note icon.

author: Joe Doss
comment: I like the hover idea. The only thing I think would make it better is the ability to change the note color easier. Our at least a few words of the note beside the floating icon. Gets a little confusing if you run more than one note.
title: Not sure

author: Lisa
comment: Crap. I open a note, go to select the theme and it closes the note. Why? That does not make sense. Also The same note transfers to a different note. It's just a mess. It has potential. But I need simple and reliable.  Uninstall.

author: A Google User
comment: Slows down my transitions between screens and makes screen flicker when note window is open.  I am using Asus Prime tablet with Apex launcher.  Please fix and then 5 stars all the way!
title: Love it but...

author: MrTholl
comment: I tries sharing a hovernote file via blutooth but it became a html so I couldnt use it on hovernote on my other phone. I also tried sharing on gmail, I was able to copy and past to the other hovernote but the format was wrong. Otherwise great app, handy for taking notes while in another app. I use it to take notes of mobile games.
title: Handy but needs better sharing

author: G. Hulse
comment: Loved this app until lately, always stops/crashes when I try to open my files. And no feedback from developer after several inquiries about it. I wonder if other users experience same problem lately.
A great app for my phone and tablet. Helps when needing to take a lot of clipboard copy/pasting and just notes in general. The themes help out with different light conditions and sorting.
title: Does what it needs to do.

author: Jonathan Lovely
comment: I wanted to love this app, as the hover portion was perfect for me. Unfortunately, all of my data has been lost from the app on three different occasions, causing me to have to rewrite or sometimes lose information.
title: I want to love it.

author: Shawn Redmond
comment: No scrollbars or flinging makes scrolling a chore, and can't drag the window partially off-screen; but other than that, I love it. I tried searching around, and there's still nothing that comes close to this.
title: Great.

author: Angelina Miari
comment: I've used hovernote for the last 3 years. Took it off my phone for a few months...and missed it like crazy! Just wasn't the same. Reinstalled it right now  because I can't live without it anymore. Awesome job...but could REALLY use an icon overhaul! That's the only reason it didn't get 5 stars.
title: I love this app

author: Tapio Säyppö
comment: Thank you for this fantastic app. :-) Edit Mon 28 Aug 2017: Dropbox has warned its users that HN will not work anymore with DB if HN is not updated by 28.9.2017! Would be a dealbreaker. :-(

author: S Murali Mohan
comment: Warm greetings to all of you! As a notes app it is very very user friendly. If it can be converted into a Clipboard with all existing features, I am sure all other clipboard apps available as on date will face extinction!
title: Excellent*

author: James Tunis
comment: Probably the handiest app I've found.  Got it originally to make notes during phone calls,  but using it more and more for general text entry.  Well done!
title: Great app!

author: Rista Delina
comment: I don't have any problems with this app. Thank you for making simple floating notes. Taking notes never easy like this. Keep your job well ☺

author: Nataliya Iacovidou
comment: As an android wear owner I greatly appreciate the mini keyboard inclusion, but if it cannot save the note in offline mode then what is the point? While online l may as well use the dictate function anyway. Please include offline mode, shocking as it may be there could be a time that l do not have my phone with me and may want to leave a note.
title: Not there yet

author: Spare Runner
comment: Not even joking, should be one of the first ten you get on a new device. As full featured as any other note pad out there (except maybe evernote, but that's more than a notepad) light weight, easy to use, well designed and pretty to look at. I wish every app was this well made
title: I'd call it a top ten app

author: Harminder Singh
comment: Hi there,  I can't live without this app, man. But now it's not being synced with dropbox no more. That's pain. I lost my phone and all my notes lost with it. I did not know when it's stopped syncing with Dropbox. Fix it please.

author: mukti pukti
comment: does the job, but with a few annoyances: (1) toolbar takes too much space, especially on phones, but even on tablets it would be more comfortable to have it smaller (2) why does it need the internet permission?

author: Bob Morris
comment: Absolutely love that this gives me the ability to make a quick note from any screen without needing to exit the app I'm in. Two questions though - the screen shots and reviews show/refer to different skins but my download only includes one standard skin. Where find the others?  Secondly, where are the note files saved? Searching via file manager doesn't reveal where they are hidden.
title: Amazingly Useful

author: Jo Makintash
comment: Pls add some transparency option to just text. When you increase/decrease transparency whole frame and text change and this makes transparency option useless. Beside, it's not possible to save text on SD card!
title: Almost perfect

author: Barry
comment: Excellent. Very clever and versatile. Notes can be dragged all over the screen and resized very easily.  Notes are stored as text files, so easily portable between applications / systems.  Would like to spot the Dev a beer!
This is bloody awesome. One thing, though.. you should be able to set (customize) the default shape for each new note.

author: Matthew Smith
comment: Pros Gets the copy and paste right, you have to use a clever start and end function but at least it works, all the other floating notepads can't do it.  The docked symbol is unobtrusive.  This one also has many useful options in the settings.   Cons  The top border is rather thick, it would be useful to have a toggle  button to trigger minimal borders which would also hide the toolbar.

author: Kiên Nguyễn
comment: This app can sync content to dropbox as well. But I hope someday it can do the same thing to google drive. Nice app and please considers about google drive sync. Thanks

author: Roy Dunne
comment: I've been a fan of this app for a while, but the theme changer really pushed it over the top. Excellent work.

reply.author: mjlim
reply.content: Just uploaded the fix to Google Play, it should roll out to you soon.

title: Better than perfect.

author: zach gaines
comment: This is the only app outside of sending messenges to yourself through Facebook chatheads to write something while another app runs behind it. Great for youtube and writing.

author: Lloyd Brass
comment: Doesn't keep my note floating after a restart, and so, useless to me. If I want to dig through menus to pull up a note, I'll use the stock memo pad- which was what I was trying to avoid.  Uninstalling.  S5/kit kat.
title: Potential, but it's just not happening

author: Nae Nae
comment: I've used Hovernote for years...Just recently it's started malfunctioning and closing on me, right in the middle of a task. I then lose my writings, important information etc... Uninstalling until problem is fixed. On the hunt for a similar app... :(
title: WHAT HAPPENED TO THIS APP?!

author: Rosaline Ong
comment: This is a superior good app but it's eating the ram aggressively thou I'm on Note 5. Btw, how do u auto bullet as u type? Thanks!
title: Great!

author: Omerob Huisemab
comment: Best Floating Note On Google Play!!!!!  This is so far the best app. It's features are so rich and so detailed. It can open multiple notes simultaneously , it can minimize, it can resize, change color and automatically bullet Points & Can do many more. This Features are totally Pro Version Features. Thank You, Now I Can Have My Floating Bible Studies. God Bless 💭 wow

author: NSXLA =]
comment: Thanks for adding themes, even though the goal was to keep the app lightweight.                  Wow just opened the app, loving the new default theme!  Very slick!

author: Justin Holland
comment: This has been my goto note app since I found it. Worth the price. The new U.I. is great,  the themes are handy, especially if you've got 2 or more notes going at once. Start on Boot, and access to Google Drive and Box, would make it even better. No complaints though.
title: Best Note App
